main event: An unidentified flying object was observed on the evening of July 19, 1964, at approximately 8:45 PM from Wright-Patterson Air Force Base.
interesting points: The object was described as quite bright and self-luminous, A brilliant white color intense in brightness, The object moved at a high speed and exhibited erratic flight patterns, It appeared to have no trail or exhaust, Witnesses estimated the object to be about the size of a star or planet when viewed through binoculars.
witness description: Professionals including an engineer with experience in observing aircraft
